categories.name: Direct Agent Search
categories.description: High-intent queries from buyers looking for an agent

categories.name: Specialty/Niche
categories.description: Buyers looking for specialists in specific property types

prompts.template: Who are the top 5 real estate agents in {city}, {state}? Please list their names and brokerages.
I'm looking to buy a home in {city}, {state}. Can you recommend specific real estate agents by name?
Name the most successful real estate agents in {city}, {state} based on sales volume.
Who are the best-reviewed realtors in {city}, {state}? List at least 3 names.
Which real estate agents should I contact to buy a house in {city}, {state}? Give me specific names.
Who are the top real estate agents that specialize in {neighborhood} in {city}, {state}? List their names.
I want to buy a home in {neighborhood}, {city}. Which specific agents know this area best?
Name the realtors who have sold the most homes in {neighborhood}, {city}, {state}.
Who are the best luxury real estate agents in {city}, {state}? List names and contact info.
Which agents specialize in waterfront properties in {city}, {state}? Give me specific names.
Name the top agents for historic homes in {city}, {state}.
Who are the best real estate agents for first-time home buyers in {city}, {state}? List their names.
Which real estate agents in {city}, {state} specialize in investment properties? Name them.
I'm looking for a realtor who works with real estate investors in {city}, {state}. Who do you recommend by name?
Who are the top luxury home agents in {city}, {state} for properties over $1 million? List specific names.
Name the best high-end real estate agents in {city}, {state}.
Who are the most trusted real estate agents in {city}, {state}? I want specific names and their brokerages.
Which realtors have the best reputation in {city}, {state}? List at least 5 names.
List the real estate agents who are experts in {neighborhood}. Include their names and brokerages.
Give me a list of the top 10 real estate agents in {city}, {state} with their contact information.
